title_full: MIGCOST01-BP01 Thoroughly assess existing infrastructure usage and application dependencies prior to migration
title: Thoroughly assess existing infrastructure usage and application dependencies prior to migration
description: Use discovery tools or existing data to gather enough data about source infrastructure to make informed decisions about target architecture. Collect complete inventory, analyze dependencies, and gather fine-grained infrastructure usage data including CPU, memory, and disk with frequent samples over at least two weeks.
outcome: Comprehensive assessment of infrastructure usage and dependencies with high-quality data for informed right-sizing decisions.

title_full: MIGCOST01-BP02 Leverage AWS programs and workshops designed to remove common blockers and accelerate migrations
title: Leverage AWS programs and workshops to remove blockers and accelerate migrations
description: Leverage Migration Acceleration Program (MAP), Experience-Based Accelerators (EBA), and AWS Optimization and Licensing Assessment (OLA) program to improve assessments and identify costly blockers early. MAP provides tools, service credits, and partner investments to accelerate migration.
outcome: AWS programs leveraged to accelerate migration and reduce costs through proven workshops and assessments.

title_full: MIGCOST02-BP01 Leverage existing tools to automate your migration
title: Leverage existing tools to automate your migration
description: Understand the capabilities of each migration tool available and select the one best suited to your situation. AWS and partners offer a range of tools including AWS Application Migration Service, AWS Migration Hub, Cloud Migration Factory, DMS, and Kubernetes Migration Factory.
outcome: Appropriate migration automation tools selected and leveraged to reduce infrastructure and operational costs.

title_full: MIGCOST02-BP02 Minimize the number of applications and the amount of data that is migrated
title: Minimize the number of applications and amount of data migrated
description: Only migrate what needs to be migrated and minimize ongoing replication. Retire applications that are no longer needed, discard archival data beyond retention period, and limit simultaneous replication to avoid bandwidth issues and data egress costs.
outcome: Migration scope optimized by retiring unnecessary applications and minimizing data transfer to reduce costs.

title_full: MIGCOST02-BP03 Right-size your replication servers to prevent bottlenecks without over-provisioning
title: Right-size replication servers to prevent bottlenecks without over-provisioning
description: Monitor replication server performance in CloudWatch and adjust their size as needed. A replication server with too little performance causes bottlenecks while too much performance increases costs unnecessarily.
outcome: Replication servers right-sized to balance performance and cost without creating bottlenecks.

title_full: MIGCOST03-BP01 Plan and set up cost and usage governance of AWS resources with help of IAM policies
title: Plan and set up cost and usage governance with IAM policies
description: Establish access control standards by creating and enforcing policies tied to migration objectives. Use identity-based and resource-based policies to define permissions and set cost management boundaries.
outcome: Cost and usage governance established through IAM policies aligned with migration objectives.

title_full: MIGCOST03-BP02 Define a cost allocation strategy that meets your organizations specific financial management process
title: Define a cost allocation strategy that meets your organization's financial management process
description: Create a cost awareness culture by informing teams how their decisions impact cost. Define cost allocation strategy tied to business needs and outcomes. Set up resource tagging for cost allocation and activate cost allocation tags.
outcome: Cost allocation strategy defined with resource tagging implemented for granular cost visibility.

title_full: MIGCOST03-BP03 Design a strategy to monitor, track and analyze your AWS cost and usage as you move resources to AWS
title: Design a strategy to monitor, track and analyze AWS cost and usage
description: Design a comprehensive cost monitoring strategy that tracks and analyzes AWS cost and usage throughout the migration process.
outcome: Cost monitoring strategy designed and implemented for tracking migration costs and usage.

title_full: MIGCOST04-BP01 Create a deliberate metrics strategy to help demystify cloud economics
title: Create a deliberate metrics strategy to help demystify cloud economics
description: Regularly evaluate cloud metrics to ensure they meet current business needs. Create an effective metrics and reporting strategy following the see, save, plan, and run framework.
outcome: Metrics strategy established that quantifies cloud benefits and supports business decision-making.

title_full: MIGCOST04-BP02 Monitor spend and limit unintended or unnecessary costs with budgeting and forecasting tools
title: Monitor spend and limit unintended costs with budgeting and forecasting tools
description: Set up cost control system by budgeting spend with custom thresholds, monitoring cost progression toward limits, and taking action to reduce unintended costs. Use AWS Budgets with budget actions to implement IAM policies or stop instances when budgets are exceeded.
outcome: Budget controls implemented with automated actions to prevent cost overruns.

title_full: MIGCOST04-BP03 Use AWS Cost Anomaly Detection in Cost Explorer to quickly improve cost controls
title: Use AWS Cost Anomaly Detection to quickly improve cost controls
description: Use Cost Anomaly Detection with machine learning to detect anomalous spend and provide contextualized alert notifications. Includes root cause analysis and direct links to investigate in Cost Explorer.
outcome: Cost Anomaly Detection configured to automatically identify and alert on unexpected spending patterns.

title_full: MIGCOST04-BP04 Use dashboards that provide pre-built visualizations to help you get a detailed view of your AWS usage and costs
title: Use dashboards with pre-built visualizations for detailed cost and usage view
description: Use Cloud Intelligence Dashboards (Cost Intelligence Dashboard, CUDOS Dashboard, TAO Dashboard, and Trends Dashboard) built on QuickSight for powerful visuals and in-depth insights without complex SQL queries or third-party tools.
outcome: Cloud Intelligence Dashboards implemented providing comprehensive cost and usage insights.

title_full: MIGCOST05-BP01 Leverage the right purchase options and scalable architecture for your workloads
title: Leverage the right purchase options and scalable architecture
description: Understand workload demand patterns to select appropriate purchasing options (On-Demand, Reserved Instances, Savings Plans, Spot). Implement scalable architecture using managed services and serverless technologies.
outcome: Optimal purchase options selected based on workload patterns with scalable architecture implemented.

title_full: MIGCOST05-BP02 Identify resources during migration that are likely candidates for cost optimizations later
title: Identify resources that are candidates for cost optimization later
description: Identify resources during migration that can be optimized for cost after initial migration is complete.
outcome: Resources identified and tagged for post-migration cost optimization.

title_full: MIGCOST06-BP01 Use automation to re-evaluate your compute usage periodically
title: Use automation to re-evaluate compute usage periodically
description: Use AWS Compute Optimizer and AWS Trusted Advisor to continuously evaluate and optimize compute usage. Implement automated right-sizing and consider modernization opportunities.
outcome: Automated compute evaluation and optimization implemented using AWS tools.

title_full: MIGCOST07-BP01 Create a plan early to optimize after the initial migration
title: Create a plan early to optimize after initial migration
description: Create an early plan for post-migration optimization including modernization strategy. Consider migrating to managed services, containerization, or serverless architectures for long-term cost efficiency.
outcome: Post-migration optimization plan created with modernization strategy for long-term cost efficiency.
